name: duplicate - Leet
summary:
Leet is where gamers share and discover the best gameplay highlights. 
 
Share your epic, funniest, or most ridiculous highlights right from your Xbox, PS4, or PC in 3 simple steps. Select your gameplay video, trim it down to that perfect moment, and share with your friends and followers! 
 
Can’t find what you’re looking for? Search and explore your favorite games or follow streamers and eSports players so you never miss a highlight. 
 
AWESOME FEATURES 
● Discover the best gameplay highlights from all your favorite games 
● Upload and trim your highlights from your Xbox One, PS4, or PC 
● Search and explore highlights from the community 
● Build an audience, follow streamers, and never miss a highlight 
● Share your highlights to Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram 
 
Leet was built for gamers, by gamers. Our goal is to celebrate gamers and their amazing moments!
